Dakota and former Rick Santorum of Pennsylvania. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are "very routine" for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.___

Jane Lynch also admitted she is "amazed" by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . She explained in an interview with The Sun newspaper: Simon Cowell and Sue say the things people wish they could in their jobs or at their school, but can't because it's not the done thing. "Just like him, she says what she wants because she can- there is nobody there to tell either of them to stop.
